content.label: I will never be deleting this app. Best app purchase ever!

Love it.  Simple and fun.  My kids love it too.  

The new multi player was a great addition.  Just love it.  You won't be disappointed.

-----------

Just glad they are still keeping the game up to date and working with new devices.  Love the game.
--------------
I do wish they would come up with new levels.  I've been done with all of them for years.  Only thing left is multiplayer and it takes a while to find people.
I still play this from time to time and enjoy the ambience. Though tough at times it is overall a calming game!
Absolutely the best sound track, challenging and riveting game modes. Immense variety. Worth downloading and playing all day long. Stop reading and go download now.
I really enjoy this game. It's super relaxing.

I've been playing this game for years. It's the closest thing to video game meditation I've ever seen. Deeply challenging in some places and at the same time straight forward. I love when I understand how any given level needs to be approached. I love the music as well. Thank you Osmos team for an incredible game.
Great visuals, music. Relaxing and mind crunching
I forgot I had this ! I stumbled upon it again , last night on one of my last app pages . It's the Most original , challenging , visually stunning and addicting game. I love it.

title.label: One of the best quality games on the market

content.label: Polished graphics, sound and gameplay. This is the only game my girlfriend will play with me and she loves it!

title.label: Amazing game that I never tire of.

content.label: With IOS 11 coming glad to see an amazing game updated for 64 bit support. I would have hated to lose this as it's a wonderful experience. Thanks guys <3
The most relaxing game I have ever played. Truly let's you reflect on life and the universe in a way that no other game has done. Highly recommend
I haven't played this in awhile and just picked it back up.  A better challenge for physics minded types, but without the math.

title.label: Best iOS game of all time

content.label: I love this game, how beautiful it looks, the way it works on an ios device, how long I can play it without getting bored.
Love the game. Very beautiful. Keep me captivated. Ran through it too quickly.
I deleted the game for now because the mechanics are to uncomfortable. If you simply add in a new moving system then I will start playing again

From the beautiful and simplistic game play to amazing and great attention to in game physics, Osmos is entrancing, interesting and a great stress reliever. It's one of the few apps I've kept on my phone not long after the iPhone came out.

This game should get nothing less than 10 stars EVER.
What a great game! The mechanics are simple yet engaging. The control is well-suited to mobile devices. All in all very well designed!

title.label: Simply ...   one of the best game you can find.

content.label: 6/5 stars....  yep, it is that awesome!
Great, unique, game. Definitely worth checking out.

Really fun game and was entirely worth it when I bought it for $4. It's similar to katamari damacy  with some interesting twists. Multiplayer is fun although sadly they removed the ability to match up with friends, that said it usually works if you both seek a game at the same time. Additionally if you're in the same room you can also play multiplayer.

I was in fear that this game was going to go out of date, happy is not the word, joy is the word, Thank you for the update. It remains, the only game I have kept on my two phones for more than 2 years!!!!! It is challenging and fun. Elegant in its simplicity ,  and pleasant to look at. The music choice is calming and etherial appropriate to this video game.

If you only can get one game it should be this one, you won't regret it. Beautiful graphics and sound design, mesmerizing, addictive, and infinitely replayable! Keep the updates coming, and release an app version of Karmaka already!!
My favorite iOS game. Played since it came out. Refreshing my review after the update. Osmos is still my favorite game

Sometimes I play games at night to help my mind settle down, and this game is quite relaxing. I enjoy it enormously. It's just difficult enough to keep the attention, but not so much to be frustrating.
Still fun as ever and I love the calming music!!!
Good
I was just lamenting that I would no longer be able to play this soon because it was 32 bit, and lo and behold here is an update to 64 bits. For free! Thanks!

App refresh resets reviews. I haven't reviewed it before so here I go. This game is very well made. I've had it since it was first released on the iPad. I keep going back to it because it's so pleasing to play.
Simple mechanics that provide an endless challenge.
Thanks for updating to 64! Was worried I'd loose one of my favorite games. Now I can keep playing. 👍
Thank you for the update to 64bit.

title.label: I was amazed with this game

content.label: So addicting I can't stop playing. Not one to write a review but this game needs to be known how great it is. Totally worth the money.
Even after 5 years this game is so much fun.  Very relaxing when you are stressing out....
This is the best game ever for iphone
One of the few iOS games I keep replaying and doesn't get boring. Fun and relaxing.

title.label: still the best - total eye/ear candy

content.label: This is hands down my favorite game - straight genius - music is icing on cake.  So good!
So happy to see one of my old favorites get brought into the modern era!  Buy it-- you'll be happy.
mediative but challenging games, beautifully done.
Outstanding support!

title.label: Easy to learn, difficult to master

content.label: The best games are easy to learn yet difficult to master. Osmos is exactly that. It's replayable for years (I have had it since 2011). Get it!
An all-time classic

Love it so far...good game!

Edit 5 years later ❤️
Amazing game - perfect balance of elements.
Worth the money, very interesting, relaxing, & original.

Literally just checked yesterday to see if there had been an update. So happy to see a new release was finally made. Super happy with the new release and features. If you need a great game to pass the time this is it!
One of the best games that I have. Play it now and again. It's so great, totally worth having.
About time. Almost four years between updates. Everything seems to work OK, except I can't hear any music, regardless of whether I restart the app or change the music volume in settings.

title.label: Amazing game updated for new iOS

content.label: One of my favorite games and the developer came back to update it for newer iOS devices and 64-bit around four years after the last update 👍👍.
Love the game-nice new future-proof update!!
